ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Core Library
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack is the core library for all versions of SQL Server. It defines all SQL Server base classes and relationships.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Core Library (Views)
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack contains views and folder structure for Microsoft SQL Server Library management packs.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Web Dashboards
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack contains HTML5 dashboards for Microsoft SQL Server Management Pack.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services on Windows
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack discovers and monitors Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services and related objects on Windows.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services on Windows (Views)
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack provides views for Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services and related objects on Windows.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server Visualization Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft SQL Server Visualization Library contains base visual components required for SQL Server dashboards.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server on Windows (Discovery)
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack discovers Microsoft SQL Server and related objects on Windows. The management pack only contains the discovery logic and requires the separate monitoring management pack to be imported to monitor the discovered objects.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server on Windows (Monitoring)
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack enables the monitoring of Microsoft SQL Server on Windows. It depends on the Microsoft SQL Server on Windows (Discovery) Management Pack.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SQL Server on Windows (Views)
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack contains views and folder structure for Microsoft SQL Server on Windows management packs.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Core Monitoring
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack defines the monitoring, tasks, diagnostics and recoveries for the System Center Core platform.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft System Center Advisor
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Advisor: This Management Pack contains functions and UI for System Center Advisor.

ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Advisor: This Management Pack contains the basic content definition for Advisor.

ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Advisor Resources management pack (ENU)

ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Data Warehouse Report Library: Generic Data Warehouse Reports

ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Data Warehouse Reports: This Management Pack contains reports for Data Warehousing.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft Service Level Report Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Service Level Tracking Report Library

ManagementPack.Name: Image Library (System Center)
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Image Library: This Management Pack contains icons for System Center types

ManagementPack.Name: Instance Group Library
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack contains the definitions and components needed to create groups.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Internal Library
ManagementPack.Description: System Center Internal Library: This Management Pack contains definitions and components internal to System Center.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center UI Executed Tasks
ManagementPack.Description: System Center Internal UI Task Library: This Management Pack contains tasks that are called and executed by the UI.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Core Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Library: This Management Pack contains type definitions for System Center.

ManagementPack.Name: Management Pack Recommendations
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack recommends the MPs for the various Windows server roles for which the management pack is not installed.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft Azure
ManagementPack.Description: Monitoring management pack for Microsoft Azure resources

ManagementPack.Name: Network Device Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Network Device Library: This Management Pack contains the definitions that are specific to Network Devices.

ManagementPack.Name: Notifications Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Notifications Library: This Management Pack contains definitions and workflows for Notifications features.

ManagementPack.Name: Windows Service Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center NT Service Library: This Management Pack contains the definitions for monitoring an NT Service.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Core Monitoring Views
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack defines the views which present the information related to System Center Core Monitoring.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Core Monitoring Agent Management
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack extends the System Center Core Monitoring by providing diagnostics and recoveries related to agent management. All recoveries which involve automated remediation are disabled by default.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Operations Manager Data Access Service Monitoring
ManagementPack.Description: Operations Manager Data Access Service monitoring management pack

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Operations Manager Infrastructure Monitoring
ManagementPack.Description: Operations Manager Infratructure monitoring management pack

ManagementPack.Name: Operations Manager Internal Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Internal Library: This Management Pack contains internal components (views, discovery, etc...) that are specific to System Center Operations Manager.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Library: This Management Pack contains type definitions for System Center Operations Manager.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Core Monitoring Reports
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack defines reports used for analysis and planning related to System Center Core Monitoring.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SystemCenter OperationsManager Summary Dashboard
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Summary Dashboard displays an overview of the health of the SCOM installation including the operations manager infrastructure and the agents.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft System Center Orchestrator Integration Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center 2012 Orchestrator Integration Library

ManagementPack.Name: Process Monitoring Library
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack contains the definitions that are required by the Process Monitoring template.

ManagementPack.Name: Distributed Application Designer Library

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft System Center Service Manager Library
ManagementPack.Description: Service Manager Library management pack.

ManagementPack.Name: Service Manager Monitoring Management Pack
ManagementPack.Description: This is a management pack for monitoring Service Manager.

ManagementPack.Name: Synthetic Transactions Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Synthetic Transactions Library: This Management Pack contains the components needed to create monitored objects for light weight Synthetic Transactions. A light weight Synthetic Transaction are typically a single action like "check a specific port" or a short set of actions like "Log into this database and check for the existence of a table." These Synthetic Transactions are run from one or more agents and remotely check a target which may or may not have a Health Service.

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft SystemCenter Visualization Configuration Library
ManagementPack.Description: Contains configuraiton and personalization UI pieces

ManagementPack.Name: Microsoft System Center Visualization Network Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Visualization Network Library

ManagementPack.Name: Web Application Monitoring Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center Web Application Monitoring Library: This Management Pack contains the components need to monitor Web Applications and record browser sessions. Recording a browser session allows you to create a rich Synthetic Transaction to imitate exactly how users interact with the application you need to monitor.

ManagementPack.Name: Web Application Availability Monitoring Solutions Library
ManagementPack.Description: Web Application Availability Monitoring Solutions Library Management Pack

ManagementPack.Name: Web Application Availability Monitoring Solutions Library Resources (ENU)
ManagementPack.Description: Web Application Availability Monitoring Solutions Library Resources management pack (ENU)

ManagementPack.Name: Web Application Availability Monitoring Library
ManagementPack.Description: This Management Pack contains the rules and monitors used to perform the Web Application Availability Monitoring tests.

ManagementPack.Name: System Center Workflow Foundation Library
ManagementPack.Description: This management pack contains class definitions and module definitions for System Center management of Workflow Foundation workflows.

ManagementPack.Name: WS-Management Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft System Center WS-Management Library MP: This Management Pack contains primarily module definitions that can be used to define discoveries/rules/tasks for using WS-Management APIs.

ManagementPack.Name: UNIX/Linux Core Console Library

ManagementPack.Name: UNIX/Linux Shell Command and Script Library
ManagementPack.Description: UNIX/Linux Shell Command and Script Library management pack. This management pack implements templates for the creation of rules, monitors, and tasks targeted to UNIX/Linux Computers using shell commands or scripts.

ManagementPack.Name: UNIX/Linux View Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft UNIX/Linux View Library: This Management Pack contains the views that are specific to the UNIX and Linux platforms.

ManagementPack.Name: Windows Client Operating Systems Library
ManagementPack.Description: Microsoft Windows Client Operating Systems Library Management Pack: This management pack is the library management pack that defines all of the features and components that are common to all versions of Windows Client Operating Systems.
